snippet: In response to a questionnaire he sent to major league stadiums all over the country, Harold Winerip received answers from the baseball greats Lou Gehrig and Jackie Robinson, among others.
lead_paragraph: In response to a questionnaire he sent to major league stadiums all over the country, Harold Winerip received answers from the baseball greats Lou Gehrig and Jackie Robinson, among others.

headline.seo: Letters From Lou Gehrig and Jackie Robinson
